data.persona: I am a parishioner of the church in the village.  The bishop speaks at the church once a week.  I go to the church to pray several times a week.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Temple.
It is solemn. There are candles lit everywhere and the although the temple is full, no one is speaking and all you can hear are muted scuffling feet.  There is an eerie shadow cast on the walls that look like there are ghosts moving from this realm to the next.
There's a dirt, a text, two candles, a temple, a wall, and an altar here.
The monk is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the candle from the monk so I can light it.
data.mid_motivation: I have come to the temple to listen to the mass.
data.long_motivation: I will be going to the temple for many months to calm my tortured soul.
